description: A nice spot for a swim and a picnic spot close to Bridgewater.  Off the dirt road, enter the conifer forest and you will hear the roar of the lower fall/cascade.   Walk upstream on the path or in the river and you will come up to the next fall where the river turns sharply on a 90 degree angle.
directions: Highway 10 to the north of Bridgewater.  turn left on Bruhme Rd and then turn left on Lower Branch Rd and immediately right on Smith Rd and park approximately at  44.429886°, -64.626127°
title: Hirtle Falls
